name: LeasingCenterCallLogs
description:
Retrieve leasing center call logs for analysis.

Use this tool to access call logs from the leasing center, supporting pagination for detailed data retrieval.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain of the client organization. This is required to identify the client's data for retrieving call logs.

parameters.name: request_body_payload
parameters.description: An array of JSON objects to be included in the request. Typically used for specifying additional data or filters for the API call.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve in a paginated response from the leasing center call logs.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page in the response. Use for pagination.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: include_pagination_links
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include pagination links in the response; set to 0 to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: The page number of paginated respons.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: X-Send-Pagination-Links
parameters.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.
